message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $150 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think $150 is still a fair price considering the product's value. Would you be able to meet me halfway?
